Summary.Abstract: Level-1A global laser pointing data (GLAH04) contain two orbits of attitude data from the spacecraft star tracker, instrument star tracker, gyro, and laser reference system, and other spacecraft attitude data required to calculate precise laser pointing.

Related_URL.Description: ICESat/GLAS web site at NASA Wallops Flight Facility
ICESat/GLAS web site at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center
ICESat/GLAS web site at University of Texas

DIF.DIF_Revision_History:
2013-04-15, Deann Miller, New HDF5 data set. 2013-04-15, Deann Miller, New HDF5 data set. 2014-02-21, Daniel Webster, Removed GLAS Subsetter from Data Access URLs list. Subsetter for GLAS HDF5 data is not available yet.
2014-11-17, Daniel Webster, In Data Citation, changed Publisher to: NASA DAAC at the National Snow and Ice Data Center. 2015-07-22, Michon Scott, Added keyword as part of Drupal migration. 2015-09-17, Daniel Webster, Revised Spatial Resolution, Temporal Resolution, and Platforms, and removed Order Data URL, for Landing Page / EDB cleanup. 2015-09-28, Daniel Webster, Added HTTPS URL to Data Access.

Metadata.Name: Version Summary
Metadata.Value: For information about Version 33, see the NSIDC ICESat Description of Data Releases page.
